pullRequest.title: Fix test cases to get correct schedule ids
pullRequest.bodyText:
Follow-up of #1451.
acceptance.ServerScheduleIT FAILED with the following error. e.g. https://github.com/treasure-data/digdag/runs/1065603120
acceptance.ServerScheduleIT > testSkipAndEnable FAILED
    java.lang.AssertionError: 
    Expected: is <2291-02-09T10:00:00Z>
         but: was <2291-02-09T00:09:00Z>
        at org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat(MatcherAssert.java:20)
        at org.junit.Assert.assertThat(Assert.java:956)
        at org.junit.Assert.assertThat(Assert.java:923)
        at acceptance.ServerScheduleIT.testSkipAndEnable(ServerScheduleIT.java:461)

beforeCommit.message: Fix test cases to get correct schedule ids

afterCommit.message: Fix test cases to get correct schedule ids

nodes.bodyText: Why do you rename this? enabled seems to be already isolated in this local scope without conflict.
